data.author: Gandhi
data.quote: Keep your thoughts positive because your thoughts become your words. Keep your words positive because your words become your behaviors. Keep your behaviors positive because your behaviors become your habits. Keep your habits positive because your habits become your values. Keep your values positive because your values become your destiny.

data.author: Tao Te Ching
data.quote: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.

data.author: Peace Pilgrim
data.quote: If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought.

data.author: Wayne Dyer
data.quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.

data.author: Ram Dass
data.quote: The spiritual journey is individual, highly personal. It can't be organized or regulated. It isn't true that everyone should follow one path. Listen to your own truth.

data.author: Dalai Lama
data.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.

data.author: Dalai Lama
data.quote: This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness.

data.author: Eckhart Tolle
data.quote: True intelligence operates silently. Stillness is where creativity and solutions to problems are found.

data.author: Scott Peck
data.quote: When we avoid the legitimate suffering that results from dealing with problems, we also avoid the growth that problems demand from us.

data.author: Jorge Ramos
data.quote: Always keep order inside chaos.

data.author: Byron Katie
data.quote: This is the time. This is the place. This is the vastness. Right here is paradise. Always. Always.

data.author: Chuang Tzu
data.quote: Do not struggle. Go with the flow of things, and you will find yourself at one with the mysterious unity of the Universe.

data.author: Idries Shah
data.quote: Enlightenment must come little by little - otherwise it would overwhelm.

data.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
data.quote: To observe without evaluating is the highest form of intelligence.

data.author: Epictetus
data.quote: We are disturbed not by what happens to us, but by our thoughts about what happens.

data.author: Erich Fromm
data.quote: Man's main task in life is to give birth to himself.

data.author: Frederick Buechner
data.quote: Listen to your life. All moments are key moments.

data.author: Lourdes Cortes Garcia
data.quote: Moments, moments, that is what life is all about.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: Every single person you meet in your life, is for the right reason in the right moment.
